ðŸ“– Summary: MyDrive is an open-source cloud file storage server, similar to Google Drive, built with Node.js, TypeScript, and MongoDB. It allows users to host their own file storage solution, supporting features like file and folder uploads/downloads, multiple database support (Amazon S3, Filesystem), file sharing, and AES256 encryption.
